content.value:
2600 Hostel DC is located in the Las Aguas neighborhood, close to the La Candelaria- ,
Centro Histórico sunrounded of interested, turist and historic places such as: La Plaza
de la Concordia, Plazoleta del Chorro de Quevedo, Plaza Simon Bolivar, Museo del oro,
Botero Museum, Library Luis Angel Arango, Cerro de Monserrate and Cerro de
Guadalupe, among others.

All Our rooms are equipped with all necessary that you need to provide you with all
expections for your stay. Our rooms are spacious and comfortable, perfect for resting. Do not worry about the cold of the city, because we have very warm and soft blankets.

We are located in the heart of Bogotá, near the historic center and the hills of the city.

description.description: 2600 Hostel DC has a familiar atmosphere prevails, offering a wonderful and privileged view of Bogota. Nothing better than a good rest to start a day full of adventures and discoveries. Thinking about it, we create a comfortable, cozy space with excellent infrastructure.
